Class Billiards

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          java.awt.Panel
              java.applet.Applet
                  Billiards
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Runnable, java.util.EventListener, javax.accessibility.Accessible
public class Billiards
extends java.applet.Applet
implements java.lang.Runnable, java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener, java.awt.event.MouseListener

Applet that could be seen as the runner and runs the whole game

Author:
Taehwan Kim and Michael Ma
See Also:
Serialized Form

calculates vertical component of velocity headed towards the collision point

Parameters:
Vx - horizontal velocity
Vy - vertical velocity
Dx - difference in x distance
Dy - difference in y distance
R - radius of ball (always 2)
Returns:
y-direction component of velocity when headed towards the collision point
